name: Village of Sacrifice - Remake
description:
Village of Sacrifice - Remake

This is a remake of my game for the Ludum Dare 43 (Link).

You are the leader of a small village a few hundred years ago.

You have to make sure your villagers have enough wood and food to survive, but you also have to keep your god happy with sacrifices. Human sacrifices.

How many days can your villagers survive?

What has changed compared to the Ludum Dare version?
  • All graphics updated by Kauai Kayote
  • All music files updated by Spicy Overlord
  • Audio controller updated
  • Tutorial scene added (sorry for that much text :D)
  • Credits scene added
  • Gameplay UI updated
  • Resource generation and consumption improved
  • Villager spawn queue added
